body: Also, I am aware that only `runfiles` are guaranteed to exist. But without the hack I mentioned, Python would resolve some chained imports to generated files to `runfiles` which fails.
body_html: Also, I am aware that only runfiles are guaranteed to exist. But without the hack I mentioned, Python would resolve some chained imports to generated files to runfiles which fails.
